news_header: US Foreign Minister Marco Rubio plans a Middle East visit in mid-February.
news_original_title: Axios: Yhdysvaltain ulkoministeri Lähi-idän kierrokselle helmikuun aikana
news_text: Marco Rubio, the US Foreign Minister, is set to visit several Middle Eastern countries around mid-February, following the Munich Security Conference on February 14. His itinerary reportedly includes Israel, the United Arab Emirates, and Saudi Arabia, according to Axios, which cites Israeli officials. Additionally, President Donald Trump mentioned the possibility of the US taking over Gaza and relocating Palestinians to neighboring countries, a proposal that has faced strong international condemnation.
